info.title: Event information
info.description1: In order to shape the highlights of Beitou and promote the Beitou business district, theme promotion activities will be held on four weekends in July 2020, combining the strength of local organizations and business districts to connect local merchants and present a wonderful event.
info.description2: During the event, five highlight check-in devices were set up, and marketing activities focusing on restaurant dishes and nakasi were planned to replicate Beitou's century-old delicacies, attracting tourists to come to Beitou to taste delicious food in summer and bathe in hot springs in winter, and to connect Beitou's local special stores , feel the charm of Beitou.
info.description3: Whether it’s a summer food tour or a winter hot spring trip, Beitou will bring you an unforgettable experience. Let’s explore this place full of surprises in Beitou!
info.location: Location: Beitou Park & Qixing Park & Geothermal Valley
info.eventName2: 復刻酒家菜，音樂同歡唱

attraction.title: Top five check-in attractions
attraction.title3: Seven Star Park (in front of Beitou Station)
attraction.subtitle1: Summer magic ~ The arrival of the hot spring magician
attraction.describe1: The magician from Qixing Mountain performs many magics in Beitou this summer, and invites everyone to come and visit Beitou this summer.
attraction.describe2: The wooden sliding door background and the flowing layers of water are used to interpret Beitou's classic hot springs. Beitou Hot Spring is full of magic and can heal the body, mind and soul of those who come here.
attraction.describe3: Using Japanese wind chimes as the design concept, visitors can drive away bad luck through the corridor and listen to the sound of wind chimes to feel the arrival of happiness. Ema can be hung on the left and right sides to pray for blessings.
attraction.describe4: Designed with a Japanese-style oil umbrella, the umbrella represents harmony and contentment. During the day, it has the aesthetic feeling of a wall of oil umbrellas, and at night, it is even more eye-catching through back-projection lighting.
attraction.describe5: The round fan symbolizes bringing good luck. It has the implicit meaning of bringing good luck to the cooperative stores. The fan in the middle can rotate to create interactivity.

main.title: Theme activities
main.describe1: The opening event planning strategy of the 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is to light up the magic kick-off ceremony. It is expected to invite the mayor of Taipei and Beichang as well as the 'Chef God Afa' to kick off the Beitou summer activities that will last for about a month. Invite people from the northern Taipei area and tourists from all over Taiwan to travel to Beitou and taste century-old restaurant cuisine. Through a series of activities such as convenient transportation, rich activities, fun competitions, and exciting entertainment, we will drive overall local consumption
main.describe2: Beitou hot spring hotels and restaurant and restaurant operators are invited to participate in the 'Beitou Summer Magic Festival' to sell delicious restaurant dishes on site. There are also limited restaurant food lunch boxes for the public to taste, and professional singers are invited to perform classic Nakasi songs, so that People enjoy restaurant food while listening to the moving melodies of Nakasi
main.describe3: Plan a series of exploration activities that parents and children love, 'DIY exploration and experience handicraft activities, Momo parent-child singing and dancing activities, bouncy castles, and Adventure Island concerts' to attract parents and children to participate in the Beitou Summer Magic Festival.
main.describe4: Plan a series of activities that are loved by parents and children, such as 'magic shows, Haibo Children's Theater performances, and bouncy castles' to attract parents and children to participate in the activities.
main.describe5: Plan the summer Good Voice Party and present the final chapter of the fantasy feast with picnics, markets, music, etc., at the most suitable temperature. The funniest party ever. The most exciting movement, showing the most classic Beitou concert with the theme of summer Nakasi

event1.subtitle3: Fun and exciting to look forward to
event1.body1: Classic restaurant banquet event, inviting local chefs from Beitou to host a restaurant banquet for 30 tables, recreating Beitou’s famous restaurant culture
event1.body2: The main light is 'Hot Spring Magician' created by Wu Qi 57 artist, and combined with the light and music show, it creates an exclusive art feast for Beitou.
event1.body3: Four consecutive weekends of themed concert performances are the best outdoor activities for tourists and families.
event1.body4: Beitou merchants, hot spring hotel operators, gourmet restaurants, cultural and creative shops and other hundreds of merchants jointly launch a series of discounts, full of discounts, and you can also get an iPhone when you spend enough

event2.body1: Invite Nakasi performing singers to sing live, recreating the classic atmosphere of Beitou Restaurant
event2.body2: Invite business district vendors and hot spring hotel operators to sell hotel discount coupons and other promotional activities on site
event2.body3: Invite local hot spring hotel operators to launch restaurant-style bento boxes, which can be enjoyed in limited quantities every day
event2.body4: Staff lectures, where hot spring hotel chefs teach in person, teaching you how to cook delicious restaurant dishes at home
event2.body5: Arrange a series of hot spring powder DIY to let children experience different fun

event3.body1: The fun Animal Adventure Island allows children to experience the most interesting summer activities
event3.body2: Invite performing singers to sing on site, creating a joyful atmosphere for parents and children to enjoy together
event3.body3: Use bubbles to create a happy atmosphere and use colorful bubbles to attract children to participate
event3.body4: Provides rental of retro children's games and arranges a series of DIY activities to allow children to experience different fun
event3.body5: Invite momo Parent-Child Channel and Tianma Opera Troupe to sing with the children on site
event3.body6: Invite market vendors to sell food, catering, cultural and creative products and other products on site to gather customers

event4.body1: The fun magic castle allows children to experience the most interesting summer activities
event4.body2: Invite performing singers to sing on site, creating a joyful atmosphere for parents and children to enjoy together
event4.body3: Invite magic masters to perform magic and interact on-site to experience wonderful magic
event4.body4: Provide rental of retro children's games and arrange a series of DIY for children to experience
event4.body5: Invite a children's theater troupe to perform a magic-themed play, attracting parents and children to enjoy
event4.body6: Invite market vendors to sell food, catering, cultural and creative products and other products on site to gather customers

event5.body1: Fun afternoon picnic allows children to experience the most interesting summer activities
event5.body2: Arrange a Nakasi live singing competition to entertain parents and children in a joyful atmosphere
event5.body3: Invite market vendors to sell food, catering, cultural and creative products and other products on site to gather customers
event5.body4: Arrange a series of hot spring powder DIY to let children experience different fun
event5.body5: Invite singers to perform at the finale and experience the wonderful afternoon of joyful songs

apply.title: Event Registration
apply.describe1: The 2024 'Beitou Summer Magic Festival' invites you to stay away from the city, take a stress-relieving trip, and gain an in-depth understanding of Beitou's century-old history. Through professional guides, explore local culture, history, nature and food, and re-understand this charming hot spring town
apply.describe2: The 2024 'Beitou Summer Magic Festival' will combine local organizations to recreate the Beitou Nakasi culture and hold the 'Reproduce the Nakasi Beitou Good Voice' singing competition. Friends who love to sing Nakasi songs will be invited to participate and sing together. Perform Taiwanese-style hometown songs and encourage the public to actively participate and enjoy outdoor activities

collect.title: Collection Journey
collect.subtitle: Top five check-in attractions
collect.describe: During the event, participate in the '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival', scan the QR Code on-site at the five major installation art check-in attractions, join the '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival LINE official account', and start the stamp collecting journey. Collect 3 points to get Get a chance to win a gashapon lottery. If you collect 5 points, you can play another gashapon lottery!
collect.point: The quantity is limited, while supplies last

prize.subtitle2: Tickets for outdoor public pool bathing
prize.note1: One unit, one person, market price NT$27,900
prize.note2: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$800
prize.note3: One serving, 100 people, market price NT$200
prize.note2nd: (Complimentary upon purchase at the catering department)

collectSocial.title: Community lottery
collectSocial.describe: Before July 28, 2024, collect 5 e-stamp points in the official LINE account of the '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival' and upload the screenshot of the e-stamp to the Hot Spring Association fan group to participate in the community lottery. Prizes include accommodation and hot spring bathing tickets provided by Beitou hoteliers!
collectSocial.point: For details, please click on the Hot Spring Association fan group link below.

prize.title1: Beitou Nanfeng Tianyue Spring Hot Spring Resort
prize.note1: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$1,000
prize.note2: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$500
prize.note3: Each bag, 24 people, market price NT$780
prize.note4: One bottle, 10 people, market price NT$150
prize.note5: One bottle, one person, market price NT$220
prize.note6: One person, 10 people, market price NT$40

store.title: Special store
store.subtitle: Exclusive offers
store.describe: Connect hundreds of specially appointed stores to respond to the event and launch special discounts during the event! For detailed store discount information, please go to the online special store map or go to the official FB fan page.

storeLottery.title: Earn money if you spend enough
storeLottery.describe: During the period from 2024/7/5 to 2024/7/28, if you go to the event's special store for a single purchase of NT$300 or more on the same day, you can get one raffle ticket, or two tickets for NT$600 (and so on). The maximum single purchase amount on the day is for 5 sheets.
storeLottery.describe2: Consumers can participate in the lottery by placing their lottery tickets into the event lottery boxes in special stores.
storeLottery.point1: 1. Please fill in your real name and mobile phone number for the raffle ticket. The organizer will not be responsible if the winner cannot be contacted.
storeLottery.point2: 2. Spending on hot springs or accommodation vouchers is not applicable to activities where the maximum amount of consumption is exceeded
storeLottery.point3: 3. Raffle tickets must be stamped with the store seal as proof, otherwise they will be invalid.

prize.subtitle4: Tickets for outdoor public pool bathing
prize.note1: One unit, one person, market price NT$36,900
prize.note2: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$11,000
prize.note3: One ticket, 20 people, market price NT$1,300
prize.note4: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$800
prize.note5: One ticket, 5 people, market price NT$500
prize.note6: One person, 15 people, market price NT$350

traffic.title: traffic control
traffic.describe: There are many bus lines in the area, among which there are more than 10 buses passing through the Veterans General Hospital, providing convenient transportation; there are also small buses 6, 7, 9, 14 and other routes that ply the mountainous roads. Please use public transportation to get there~

transportation.describe1: By MRT, you can take the Tamsui-Xinyi Line and get off at Beitou Station, then take the Xinbeitou Branch Line and get off at Xinbeitou Station.
transportation.describe2: You can take buses 216, 218 District, 218 Direct Bus, 223, 266, 602, Xiao 6, Xiao 7 Nanruan Commuter Beitou Line and get off at Xinbeitou Station and Beitou Park
transportation.describe3: Head towards Beitou to the end of Daye Road

qa.title: q&a
qa.question1: Q1. What is the event time and location of '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival'?
qa.question2: Q2. What is the event time and location of '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival'?
qa.question3: Q3. What is the event time and location of '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival'?
qa.question4: Q4. What is the event time and location of '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival'?
qa.question5: Q5. What is the event time and location of '2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival'?
qa.answer1: The 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is a month-long event from 7/5 (Friday) to 7/28 (Sunday); the event area covers the area around Xinbeitou MRT Station, including: Xinbeitou MRT Station Square, Qixing Street, (the three major parks of Qixing, Qihu, and Beitou), and Geothermal Valley.
qa.answer2: The 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is a month-long event from 7/5 (Friday) to 7/28 (Sunday); the event area covers the area around Xinbeitou MRT Station, including: Xinbeitou MRT Station Square, Qixing Street, (the three major parks of Qixing, Qihu, and Beitou), and Geothermal Valley.
qa.answer3: The 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is a month-long event from 7/5 (Friday) to 7/28 (Sunday); the event area covers the area around Xinbeitou MRT Station, including: Xinbeitou MRT Station Square, Qixing Street, (the three major parks of Qixing, Qihu, and Beitou), and Geothermal Valley.
qa.answer4: The 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is a month-long event from 7/5 (Friday) to 7/28 (Sunday); the event area covers the area around Xinbeitou MRT Station, including: Xinbeitou MRT Station Square, Qixing Street, (the three major parks of Qixing, Qihu, and Beitou), and Geothermal Valley.
qa.answer5: The 2024 Beitou Summer Magic Festival is a month-long event from 7/5 (Friday) to 7/28 (Sunday); the event area covers the area around Xinbeitou MRT Station, including: Xinbeitou MRT Station Square, Qixing Street, (the three major parks of Qixing, Qihu, and Beitou), and Geothermal Valley.
